DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to assess the regularity of the proceedings in the case of a patient with bradycardia ECG.
DOC.brief_title: Can Medical Personnel Properly Proceed in the Case of a Patient With Bradycardia?
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study maximum 1 year of work experience in medicine paramedics, nurses, physicians not meet the above criteria wrist or low back diseases pregnancy
